channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2024040626
item.description:

item.title: Report X-2024040354
item.description:
Report X-2024040354

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-16T18:13:46+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-29
  • City: BROCKTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was unloaded from hub trailer 828312 with wet cardboard from internal leakage. Improperly braced in trailer. Manager alerted and pkg brought to QA in red HAZMAT bucket. DescribePack: 1 1USGAL bottle with a broken cap resulting in spilled contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed upright in a red HAZMAT bin and brought to QA.
